examples: Jane tendered her resignation to the board of directors, but they refused.

definitions.definition: A written or oral declaration that one resigns .
An uncomplaining acceptance of something undesirable but unavoidable.
examples: With resignation I acknowledged that after the accident I would not be able to ski again.

definitions.definition: The form by which a vassal returns the feu into the hands of a superior .

secondary_definitions: A written or oral declaration that one resigns .
An uncomplaining acceptance of something undesirable but unavoidable.
( Scots law , historical ) The form by which a vassal returns the feu into the hands of a superior .
